data.field: connect - connect to a remove socket

Attempts to connect to a remote socket, just as the connect system call does. Returns TRUE if it succeeded, FALSE otherwise. NAME should be a packed address of the appropriate type for the socket. See the examples in [%linkNodeTitle "perlman:perlipc|Sockets: Client/Server Communication", $NODE, "Sockets: Client/Server Communication",{anchor=>"Sockets_Client_Server_Communica"};%].
